Generate a Rectangular sf Plot Grid

setplot.Rd

Creates a simple rectangular spatial plot of specified length and width in meters, and returns a 1m x 1m sf grid overlaid on that area. CRS is EPSG:3857 by default.

Usage

setplot(length, width, crs = 3857, quiet = TRUE)

Arguments

length

Numeric. Length of the plot in meters (X-dimension).

width

Numeric. Width of the plot in meters (Y-dimension).

crs

Integer. Coordinate Reference System (default = 3857).

Value

An sf object representing a grid of 1m x 1m cells covering the defined plot.

Examples

grid <- setplot(10, 5)
plot(grid)
